title: User Authentication Success for FC
description: Verify that a Finance Consultant (FC) can successfully authenticate using a valid resident ID and is redirected to the FC dashboard with session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the authentication screen
Enter a valid resident ID for an FC user
Submit login credentials
Verify login success and user is redirected to the FC dashboard
Verify session is persisted across app restarts

title: User Authentication Success for Admin
description: Verify that an admin user can authenticate using a valid resident ID and is redirected to the admin dashboard with session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the authentication screen
Enter a valid resident ID for an admin user
Submit login credentials
Verify login success and user is redirected to the admin dashboard
Verify session is persisted across app restarts

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Resident ID
description: Verify that authentication fails with an invalid or unregistered resident ID and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the authentication screen
Enter an invalid or unregistered resident ID
Submit login credentials
Verify login failure and appropriate error message is displayed

title: FC Registration Form Validation Success
description: Verify that FC registration form accepts valid personal, contact, and bank information and successfully saves data to Supabase.

steps.description: Navigate to the FC registration form
Complete all required personal, contact, and bank information fields with valid data
Submit the registration form
Verify form submission success and data is saved to Supabase
Verify onboarding progress is updated accordingly

title: FC Registration Form Validation for Invalid Input
description: Verify that the registration form properly validates and shows errors for invalid or missing input data in all fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the FC registration form
Enter invalid data or leave required fields blank in personal, contact, and bank information sections
Attempt to submit the form
Verify appropriate validation error messages are displayed for each invalid or missing field
Verify form submission is prevented until errors are resolved

title: Allowance Consent Multi-step Agreement Completion
description: Verify that FCs can view the allowance consent multi-step agreement, select consent date with date picker, and submit consent successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the allowance consent screen
Review all agreement slides sequentially
Select a consent date using the date picker
Submit the consent
Verify consent status is updated and timestamp is recorded correctly in FC profile

title: Allowance Consent Handling of Missing Actions
description: Verify that missing consent date or incomplete agreement navigation prevents submission with appropriate error messaging.

steps.description: Navigate to the allowance consent screen
Attempt to submit consent without selecting a date
Verify submission is blocked and error message indicating missing consent date is shown
Attempt to submit consent without viewing all agreement steps/slides
Verify submission is blocked and prompt to complete agreement is shown

title: Document Upload Success with Notifications
description: Verify FCs can select and upload required documents, files are properly saved to Supabase storage, and admins receive push notifications upon submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the document upload screen
Select required document files using the document picker
Upload selected documents
Verify that files are successfully uploaded and stored in Supabase
Verify admins receive Expo push notifications regarding the document submission

title: Document Upload Failure Handling
description: Verify proper error handling and user feedback when document upload fails due to network or file format issues.

steps.description: Navigate to the document upload screen
Attempt to upload invalid file formats or simulate network failure during upload
Verify that an error message is displayed specifying the upload failure reason
Verify upload status reflects failure and user can retry the upload

title: Exam Application Submission Success
description: Verify FCs can apply for life and non-life exams by filling out the application forms with correct validation and submitting applications successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to exam application screen for life and then non-life options
Complete all required fields accurately in the exam application form
Submit exam application
Verify application is successfully saved in Supabase
Verify UI reflects updated exam application status

title: Exam Application Form Validation Errors
description: Verify that incomplete or invalid exam application fields trigger validation errors and prevent submission.

steps.description: Navigate to exam application screen
Enter invalid or incomplete data in required fields
Attempt to submit the application
Verify validation errors appear for missing or invalid fields
Verify application submission is blocked until errors are fixed

title: Admin Exam Management - Candidate Scheduling and Status Update
description: Verify admin can view exam applicants, schedule exam dates, update candidate statuses, and changes reflect in UI and data store.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to exam management screens
View list of exam candidates for life and non-life exams
Schedule exam appointments for candidates
Update candidate exam statuses (e.g. approved, rejected, pending)
Verify updates are saved properly in Supabase
Verify UI reflects current exam scheduling and candidate status accurately

title: 1:1 Chat Messaging Between FCs and Admins
description: Verify real-time sending and receiving of messages between FC and admin users, with thread management and push notifications working correctly.

steps.description: Log in as FC user and open chat interface
Send a message to admin
Verify message is delivered to admin and appears in chat thread
Log in as admin and reply to the FC
Verify FC receives reply message in real-time
Verify that appropriate push notifications are triggered on new messages for both roles

title: Chat Message Failure and Retry Mechanism
description: Verify that message sending errors due to network issues properly show failure state and allow users to retry sending messages.

steps.description: Simulate network failure while sending a chat message as FC or admin
Verify message sending fails with visible error or retry indicator
Attempt to resend failed message
Verify message is successfully sent after retry when network is restored

title: Admin Notice Creation and Notification Management
description: Verify admins can create new notices, publish them, manage notification lists, and that notices are stored and retrievable correctly.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to notice creation screen
Fill notice form with valid title, content, and optional metadata
Submit and publish the notice
Verify notice is saved to Supabase and appears in notice list
Navigate to notification list and verify notice notifications display correctly

title: Admin Registration and Appointment Tools Functionality
description: Verify admin tools allow managing registrations and appointments with correct data saving, retrieval, and UI updates.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open registration management screen
Add, edit, or delete registration entries
Verify changes persist in Supabase and reflect instantly in UI
Navigate to appointment management screen
Schedule, modify, or cancel appointments
Verify appointment updates persist and UI shows accurate scheduling info

title: UI Component Rendering Consistency Across Devices
description: Verify that all reusable, themed UI components render consistently across supported devices and screen sizes, and respond properly to keyboard and notification events.

steps.description: Open screens using parallax scrolling, haptic tabs, status toggles, and keyboard-aware layouts on different device models and orientations
Verify UI elements render correctly without layout issues or visual glitches
Trigger keyboard display and hide events and observe UI adjustments
Verify keyboard-aware components adjust layout appropriately without occluding inputs
Trigger push notification prompts and observe UI response
Verify notification UI components render and function as expected
